6. Subredes de 500 host mínimo... IP: 172.15.0.0 /11 Máscara: 255.224.0.0

255.244.0.0  
255.11100000.00000000.00000000
172.00001111.00000000.00000000 
red   |     host

2 a la 9=512=510+2(reserva)

172.0.0.0 -> IP red
172.0001111.255.255
172.15.255.255 -> IP Broadcast
172.0.2.0/23

172.0.00000000.00000000
    red     |   host
172.0.1.255 -> IP Broadcast

a. El host 254, de la subred 3854.
3854*2=7708=1111000011100
172.00011110.00011100.0

b. El host 64, de la subred 198.
